channel.title: How to make a command?
channel.description: how do i create a command? for example i want a ::master command.. i know the codes but how do i put it so it actually gives u every 99 stat??

item.title: How to make a command?
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

p.skillLvl[0] = 99;
p.skillXP[0] = 140000000;

p.skillXP[1] = 140000000;

p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, 0);
p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, 1);

p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, 24);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “<img=1><col=fff000><shad=0202>Congrats you are now maxed!<img=1>”);

put that below } else if(cmd[0].equals(“master”) && p.rights > 3) { <-- that is the rights if you want so everyone can do master change to 0 for mod change to 1 for admin change to 2.

should be under commands.java
